channel.title: Railway Jobs on YOJNA PORTAL

item.title: RRB Railway Group D Online Apply (Extented)
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Railway RRB Centralized Recruitment CEN 08/2024 Group D Exam 2025 Railway RRB Centralized Recruitment CEN 08/2024 Group D Exam 2025 Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) Short Details of Notification RRB CEN No. 08/2024 Important Dates Application Begin:23/01/2025 Last Date for Apply Online:01/03/2025 Last Date Fee Payment:03/03/2025 Correction / Edit Form:04-13 March 2025 RRB Group D Exam Date:As per Schedule Admit Card Available:Before Exam Application Fee General / OBC / EWS : 500/-SC / ST / PH / EBC : 250/-All Category Female : 250/-Pay the Examination Fee Through UPI, Debit Card, Credit Card, Net Banking.

item.title: RRC ECR Patna Apprentices Online Form 2025
item.description: Indian Railway East Central Railway ECR Patna has relased Various Trade Apprentices 2025. Those candidates who are interested in this Railway RRC ECR Patna Apprentices 2025-2026 can apply online from 25 January 2025 to 14 February 2025

item.title: RRC Gorakhpur Apprentices 2025 Apply Online
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> NER Gorakhpur Various Trade Apprentices Recruitment 2025 NER Gorakhpur Various Trade Apprentices Recruitment 2025 North Eastern Railway, NER Gorakhpur Short Details of Notification RRC Gorakhpur NER/RRC/Act Apprentice/2025-26 Important Dates Application Begin: 24/01/2025Last Date for Apply Online: 23/02/2025 upto 05 PM OnlyPay Exam Fee Last Date: 23/02/2025 Application Fee General / OBC / EWS: 100/-SC / ST / Women: 0/-Pay the Exam Fee Through Debit Card / Credit Card / Net Banking Only.

item.title: Railway RRB Ministerial and Isolated Post CEN 07/2024 Apply Online for 1036 Post
